title: This song always makes me fucking sad every time I play it

embed.description: This track wasn't on Youtube, so I decided to upload it. This is the music that is played when you are about to say goodbye to your chao and send it to a faraway forest. Pretty sad music.

body:
Deleting a chao is one of the most emotional things i have ever done as a gamer.


Fuck aerith's death scene, this is much sadder than that.
